## ICreateVerifiablePresentationLDArgs.keyRef property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Optional. The key handle ([IKey.kid](./core.ikey.kid.md)) from the internal database.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
keyRef?: string;
```
